titleStmt.title: A brief apologie prouing the possession of William Sommers. Written by Iohn Dorrell, a faithful Minister of the Gospell: but published without his knowledge, with a dedicatorie epistle disclosing some disordered procedings against the saide Iohn Dorrell
titleStmt.author: Darrel, John, b. ca. 1562.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
